headline: Mark Cuban Tells Governors Not To Let The Federal Government Take TikTok—'It'll Only Get Worse'
summary: Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban recently told state leaders to push back against federal control of social media app TikTok, warning, “Don't let the federal government take it. It'll only get worse.” TikTok Ownership Fight Intensifies Cuban's remarks during the opening session of the National Governors Association 2025 Summer Meeting in July come as the high-stakes battle over TikTok's U.S. future continues. headline: July Market Recap: Positioning For AI Demand And Policy Uncertainty
summary: Our framework focuses on where structural shifts are creating lasting opportunity, not on short-term market movements.
